assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Emami Limited manufactures and markets personal and healthcare products in India and internationally. It provides Boroplus Antiseptic Cream, Prickly Heat Powder, Doodh kesar body lotion, Zero Oil Zero Pimple Face Wash, Perfect Touch Cream, and Healthy White Fairness Cream; Navratna Cool Oil, Extra Thanda Oil, Garam Ayurvedic Oil, Almond Cool Oil, Cool Talc, and Smart Cool Talc; Zandu Balm and Ultra Power Balm; and Fair and Handsome fairness cream for men, Instant Fairness Face Wash, and Complete Winter Solution. The company also offers Mentho Plus Balm; Fast Relief Pain Relief Ointment; Sona Chandi Chyawanprash Plus; Kesari Jivan Chyawanprash; Vasocare Herbal Petroleum Jelly; 7 Oils in One- damage control hair oil; Kesh King ayurvedic medicinal oil; Diamond Shine cream hair color; HE Deodorants and HE On The Go waterless face wash; Emami Golden beauty talc; and Emami Naturally Fair herbal fairness cream. Emami Limited was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Kolkata, India.
